trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Conversion" /> module contains the procedures used to perform various conversion operations.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Conversion" /> 模块包含用于执行各种转换操作的过程。

trans-unit.source: This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that convert decimal numbers to other bases, numbers to strings, strings to numbers, and one data type to another.
trans-unit.target: 此模块支持的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员，它们将十进制数字转换为其他基数数字的字符串、 字符串转换为数字，和一个数据类型转换为另一个。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用`Hex`函数以返回数字的十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type to which to convert the object.
trans-unit.target: 该对象要转换为的类型。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为指定类型。

trans-unit.source: An object whose type at run time is the requested target type.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其类型在运行时为请求的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the `TargetType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `CTypeDynamic`方法将转换作为传递的对象`Expression`由指定的类型参数`TargetType`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象是动态对象，`CTypeDynamic`方法适用于可用的动态转换。

trans-unit.source: The `CTypeDynamic` method applies dynamic conversions in accordance with the conversion semantics defined by the object itself.
trans-unit.target: `CTypeDynamic`方法适用根据定义对象本身的转换语义的动态转换。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic object inherits from <xref:System.Dynamic.DynamicObject>, the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态对象继承自<xref:System.Dynamic.DynamicObject>、`CTypeDynamic`方法首先尝试使用用户定义的静态转换执行转换。

trans-unit.source: If the user-defined, static conversion fails, the `CTypeDynamic` method attempts to perform the conversion by using dynamic conversions.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户定义的静态转换失败，`CTypeDynamic`方法尝试通过使用动态转换执行转换。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic object implements <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider>, the `CTypeDynamic` method gives precedence to dynamic conversions over user-defined, static conversions.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态对象实现<xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider>、`CTypeDynamic`方法使动态转换优先级能够对用户定义的静态转换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`CTypeDynamic`方法来使用动态对象所定义的转换转换为字符串的动态对象。

trans-unit.source: The type to which to convert the object.
trans-unit.target: 该对象要转换为的类型。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to the specified generic type.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为指定的泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: An object statically typed as the requested generic type.
trans-unit.target: 静态类型化为请求的泛型类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the type of the generic parameter.
trans-unit.target: `CTypeDynamic`方法将转换作为传递的对象`Expression`参数类型的泛型参数所指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象是动态对象，`CTypeDynamic`方法适用于可用的动态转换。

trans-unit.target: `CTypeDynamic`方法适用根据定义对象本身的转换语义的动态转换。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic object inherits from <xref:System.Dynamic.DynamicObject>, the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态对象继承自<xref:System.Dynamic.DynamicObject>、`CTypeDynamic`方法首先尝试使用用户定义的静态转换执行转换。

trans-unit.target: 如果用户定义的静态转换失败，`CTypeDynamic`方法尝试通过使用动态转换执行转换。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`CTypeDynamic`方法来使用动态对象所定义的转换转换为字符串的动态对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.
trans-unit.target: 返回与给定的错误号对应的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.
trans-unit.target: 返回与给定的错误号对应的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: The error message that corresponds to the most recent run-time error.
trans-unit.target: 对应于最新运行时错误的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error.
trans-unit.target: `ErrorToString`函数检查的属性设置`Err`用于标识最新的运行时错误的对象。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object.
trans-unit.target: 返回值`ErrorToString`函数对应于`Description`属性`Err`对象。

trans-unit.source: If no run-time error has occurred, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果不发生任何运行时错误，`ErrorToString`返回一个零长度字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 及更低版本中，此功能由`Error`函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码使用`ErrorToString`函数来显示对应的错误消息为指定的错误号。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ErrorNumber" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ErrorNumber" /> 超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Any valid error number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的错误号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.
trans-unit.target: 返回与给定的错误号对应的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: The error message that corresponds to a given error number.
trans-unit.target: 与给定错误号对应的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error.
trans-unit.target: `ErrorToString`函数检查的属性设置`Err`用于标识最新的运行时错误的对象。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object.
trans-unit.target: 返回值`ErrorToString`函数对应于`Description`属性`Err`对象。

trans-unit.source: If `ErrorNumber` is a valid error number but is not defined, `ErrorToString` returns the string `"Application-defined or object-defined error."` If `ErrorNumber` is not valid, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ErrorNumber`是有效的错误号，但未定义，`ErrorToString`返回字符串`"Application-defined or object-defined error."`如果`ErrorNumber`无效，将会出错。

trans-unit.source: If `ErrorNumber` is omitted, the message corresponding to the most recent run-time error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ErrorNumber`省略，到最新相对应的消息返回运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: If no run-time error has occurred or `ErrorNumber` is 0, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果未运行时已发生错误或`ErrorNumber`为 0，`ErrorToString`返回一个零长度字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 及更低版本中，此功能由`Error`函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码使用`ErrorToString`函数来显示对应的错误消息为指定的错误号。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ErrorNumber" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ErrorNumber" /> 超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必须的。

trans-unit.source: A number of type <see langword="Double" /> or any valid numeric expression.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" /> 类型的数字或任何有效的数值表达式。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Number</c> contains <see langword="Nothing" />, <see langword="Nothing" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Number</c> 包含 <see langword="Nothing" />，则返回 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value.
trans-unit.target: 同时`Int`和`Fix`函数删除的小数部分`Number`并返回结果的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 之间的差异`Int`和`Fix`函数是，如果`Number`为负，`Int`返回小于或等于第一个负整数`Number`，而`Fix`返回第一个负整数大于或等于`Number`。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Int`将-8.4 转换成-9，和`Fix`将-8.4 转换成-8。

trans-unit.source: `Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`
trans-unit.target: `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示了如何`Int`和`Fix`函数将返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数为负号，`Int`函数返回的第一个负整数小于或等于数;`Fix`函数将返回第一个负整数大于或等于数。

trans-unit.source: The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例要求你指定`Option Strict Off`因为从隐式转换类型`Double`类型`Integer`下不允许`Option Strict On`:

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。

trans-unit.source: However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`CInt`舍入到最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数调用的结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而舍入为整数的显式转换。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。

trans-unit.source: However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`CInt`舍入到最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数调用的结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而舍入为整数的显式转换。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Number is not specified.
trans-unit.target: Number 未指定。

trans-unit.source: Number is not a numeric type.
trans-unit.target: Number 不是 Numeric 类型。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必须的。

trans-unit.source: A number of type <see langword="Double" /> or any valid numeric expression.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" /> 类型的数字或任何有效的数值表达式。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Number</c> contains <see langword="Nothing" />, <see langword="Nothing" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Number</c> 包含 <see langword="Nothing" />，则返回 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value.
trans-unit.target: 同时`Int`和`Fix`函数删除的小数部分`Number`并返回结果的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 之间的差异`Int`和`Fix`函数是，如果`Number`为负，`Int`返回小于或等于第一个负整数`Number`，而`Fix`返回第一个负整数大于或等于`Number`。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Int`将-8.4 转换成-9，和`Fix`将-8.4 转换成-8。

trans-unit.source: `Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`
trans-unit.target: `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示了如何`Int`和`Fix`函数将返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数为负号，`Int`函数返回的第一个负整数小于或等于数;`Fix`函数将返回第一个负整数大于或等于数。

trans-unit.source: Up to sixteen hexadecimal characters
trans-unit.target: 多达十六个十六进制字符

trans-unit.source: You can represent hexadecimal numbers directly by preceding numbers in the proper range with `&H`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以直接通过在适当范围的数字前面表示十六进制数字`&H`。

trans-unit.source: For example, `&H10` represents decimal 16 in hexadecimal notation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`&H10`表示以十六进制表示法的十进制数 16。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用`Hex`函数以返回数字的十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必须的。

trans-unit.source: A number of type <see langword="Double" /> or any valid numeric expression.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" /> 类型的数字或任何有效的数值表达式。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Number</c> contains <see langword="Nothing" />, <see langword="Nothing" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Number</c> 包含 <see langword="Nothing" />，则返回 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value.
trans-unit.target: 同时`Int`和`Fix`函数删除的小数部分`Number`并返回结果的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 之间的差异`Int`和`Fix`函数是，如果`Number`为负，`Int`返回小于或等于第一个负整数`Number`，而`Fix`返回第一个负整数大于或等于`Number`。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Int`将-8.4 转换成-9，和`Fix`将-8.4 转换成-8。

trans-unit.source: `Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`
trans-unit.target: `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示了如何`Int`和`Fix`函数将返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数为负号，`Int`函数返回的第一个负整数小于或等于数;`Fix`函数将返回第一个负整数大于或等于数。

trans-unit.source: The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例要求你指定`Option Strict Off`因为从隐式转换类型`Double`类型`Integer`下不允许`Option Strict On`:

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。

trans-unit.source: However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`CInt`舍入到最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数调用的结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而舍入为整数的显式转换。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" /> 类型的数字或任何有效的数值表达式。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Number</c> contains <see langword="Nothing" />, <see langword="Nothing" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Number</c> 包含 <see langword="Nothing" />，则返回 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer portion of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value.
trans-unit.target: 同时`Int`和`Fix`函数删除的小数部分`Number`并返回结果的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 之间的差异`Int`和`Fix`函数是，如果`Number`为负，`Int`返回小于或等于第一个负整数`Number`，而`Fix`返回第一个负整数大于或等于`Number`。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Int`将-8.4 转换成-9，和`Fix`将-8.4 转换成-8。

trans-unit.source: `Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`
trans-unit.target: `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).`

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示了如何`Int`和`Fix`函数将返回数字的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数为负号，`Int`函数返回的第一个负整数小于或等于数;`Fix`函数将返回第一个负整数大于或等于数。

trans-unit.source: The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例要求你指定`Option Strict Off`因为从隐式转换类型`Double`类型`Integer`下不允许`Option Strict On`:

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。

trans-unit.source: However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`CInt`舍入到最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`CInt`函数调用的结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而舍入为整数的显式转换。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="String" /> representation of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的 <see langword="String" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="String" /> representation of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的 <see langword="String" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: When numbers are converted to strings, a leading space is always reserved for the sign of `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 当数字转换为字符串时，为的符号始终保留一个前导空格`Number`。

trans-unit.source: If `Number` is positive, the returned string contains a leading space, and the plus sign is implied.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Number`为正，则返回的字符串包含前导空格，并暗含加号。

trans-unit.source: A negative number will include the minus sign (-) and no leading space.
trans-unit.target: 为负数将包括减号 （-） 和没有前导空格。

trans-unit.source: Use the `Format` function to convert numeric values you want formatted as dates, times, or currency or in other user-defined formats.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Format`函数将转换为日期、 时间或货币或其他用户定义的格式，您需要格式化的数字值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the `Str` function, the `Format` function does not include a leading space for the sign of `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 与不同`Str`函数，`Format`函数不包括的符号的前导空间`Number`。

trans-unit.source: The `Str` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator.
trans-unit.target: `Str`函数仅将句点识别 (`.`) 作为有效的小数分隔符。

trans-unit.source: If different decimal separators are used (for example, in international applications), use the `CStr` or `Format` functions to convert a number to a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用不同的小数点分隔符 （例如，在国际应用程序），使用`CStr`或`Format`函数将数字转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: To get the string representation of a number in a particular culture, use the number's `ToString(IFormatProvider)` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取特定区域性的字符串表示形式大量，使用数字的`ToString(IFormatProvider)`方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, use <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A> when converting a value of type `Double` to a string.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.Double.ToString%2A>转换类型的值时`Double`为字符串。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `Str` function to return a `String` representation of a number.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用`Str`函数以返回`String`的数字表示形式。

trans-unit.source: When a positive number is converted to a string, a leading space is always reserved for its sign.
trans-unit.target: 时的正数值转换为字符串，为其符号始终保留一个前导空格。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="Number" /> is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 未指定 <paramref name="Number" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="Number" /> 不是 Numeric 类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numbers contained in a string as a numeric value of appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串中包含的数字作为适当类型的数值返回。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必须的。

trans-unit.source: Any valid <see langword="String" /> expression, <see langword="Object" /> variable, or <see langword="Char" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的 <see langword="String" /> 表达式、<see langword="Object" /> 变量或 <see langword="Char" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Expression</c> is of type <see langword="Object" />, its value must be convertible to <see langword="String" /> or an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Expression</c> 的类型为 <see langword="Object" />，其值必须可转换为 <see langword="String" />，否则将发生 <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> 错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numbers contained in a string as a numeric value of appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串中包含的数字作为适当类型的数值返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numbers contained in a string as a numeric value of appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串中包含的数字作为适当类型的数值返回。

trans-unit.source: The `Val` function stops reading the string at the first character it cannot recognize as part of a number.
trans-unit.target: `Val`函数停止读取它不能识别为一个数字部分的第一个字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Symbols and characters that are often considered parts of numeric values, such as dollar signs and commas, are not recognized.
trans-unit.target: 无法识别符号和通常被认为是数字值，如美元符号和逗号，一部分的字符。

trans-unit.source: However, the function recognizes the radix prefixes `&O` (for octal) and `&H` (for hexadecimal).
trans-unit.target: 但是，该函数可以识别的基数前缀`&O`(为八进制) 和`&H`（对于十六进制）。

trans-unit.source: Blanks, tabs, and linefeed characters are stripped from the argument.
trans-unit.target: 从自变量被剥离空格、 制表符和换行字符。

trans-unit.source: The following call returns the value 1615198.
trans-unit.target: 以下调用返回的值 1615198。

trans-unit.target: 以下调用返回的十进制值为-1。

trans-unit.source: The `Val` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator.
trans-unit.target: `Val`函数仅将句点识别 (`.`) 作为有效的小数分隔符。

trans-unit.source: When different decimal separators are used, as in international applications, use `CDbl` or `CInt` instead to convert a string to a number.
trans-unit.target: 当使用不同的小数点分隔符时，如下所示国际应用程序，使用`CDbl`或`CInt`改为将字符串转换为数字。

trans-unit.source: To convert the string representation of a number in a particular culture to a numeric value, use the numeric type's `Parse(String, IFormatProvider)` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将特定区域性的数字的字符串表示转换为数字值，使用数值类型的`Parse(String, IFormatProvider)`方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, use <xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> when converting a string to a `Double`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>时将字符串转换`Double`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidCastException> exception might be raised in response to certain uncommon number formats.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidCastException>可能在某些少见的数字格式的响应中引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code raises this exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码将引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The conflict between the number formatted as a `Double` and the `Integer` and `Long` type characters would be caught by the compiler if it were not contained in a string.
trans-unit.target: 数之间的冲突格式化为`Double`和`Integer`和`Long`如果它未包含在一个字符串，将由编译器捕获到的类型字符。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`Val`函数以返回每个字符串中包含的数字。
